name: kindle-highlights-browser
description: A Kindle highlights viewer. Built using Node, Electron, and React.

scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:osx && npm run clean:win && npm run clean:linux
scripts.pack:win: npm run clean:win && electron-packager . --overwrite --out=dist/win32 --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --electron-version=1.4.15 --appname='Kindle Highlights Browser' --icon=assets/icons/BlackvariantKindle.ico --ignore=assets --ignore=typings --ignore=.vscode --ignore=dist --ignore=node_modules
scripts.pack:osx: npm run clean:osx && electron-packager . --overwrite --out=dist/osx --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --electron-version=1.4.15 --appname='Kindle Highlights Browser' --icon=assets/icons/BlackvariantKindle.icns --ignore=assets --ignore=typings --ignore .vscode --ignore=dist --ignore=node_modules
scripts.pack:linux: npm run clean:linux && electron-packager . --overwrite --out=dist/linux --platform=linux --arch=x64 --electron-version=1.4.15 --appname='Kindle Highlights Browser' --icon=assets/icons/BlackvariantKindle.ico --ignore=assets --ignore=typings --ignore=.vscode --ignore=dist --ignore=node_modules

author: Destin Moulton
